name: THE LAST BOT
description:
The Last BOT

👍 PLAY STORY FULL SCREEN 👍

Hello friends, my name is BOT and this is a short story for the weekly game jam https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-90 with the theme 'radioactivity'. 

Hope you like it.
